## Goals of the BioRestNet
:::{.nonincremental}

* A worldwide database on TEK contribution to restoration
  * Plants & Animals
  * inspired on [TRY](https://www.try-db.org/TryWeb/Home.php) and [GlobUNT](https://patspo.shinyapps.io/GlobalUsefulTrees/)
* Ecological assessments of TEK
* Generate participatory models of restoration
* Citizen Science promotion (Earthwatch Project led by Dr. Antonio Uzal)

:::
